response.original_title: Destination America: The People and Cultures That Created a Nation
response.overview: Destination America explores the remarkable mass migration to the United States. Each episode features the experiences of specific immigrants individuals and families placing their stories in a larger and important historical context: the world the immigrants left behind, the new world they encountered, the places from which they came, the roots that defined them as individuals, the frustrations, hardships, discontent and ambition that made and make America their destination.
response.title: Destination America: The People and Cultures That Created a Nation
